modName: Glass fix for Wearable lanterns SMIM patch (optional HDTPE support)
summary:
You can't play skyrim without marvelous Brumbek's SMIM ?
You want to use SMIM lantern with Chesko's Wearable lanterns ?
You want HDT ?
You want avoid strong glass reflection when you use ENB ?
It is the solution ;)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][center][size=5]Glass fix for Wearable lanterns SMIM patch[/size][/center][/color]

Wearable lantern is a very good mod, but, until now, i must choose between [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52348/?]Glass fix for Cheskos Wearable Lanterns by [b]Uncheat[/b][/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34535/?]Wearable Lanterns SMIM Patch by Telamont[/url].
I'm a perfectionist, so i have mixed these two mods to avoid choosing ;)

It is a small mod I made to learn how to do simple edit with nifskope, I use it in-game without problem.
I have edited meshes from Telamont's mod to use Uncheat's mod texture.

PS: This mod can't break your game it only meshes and textures.

[color=#ff7700][size=4][u]Credit[/u][/size][/color]
Thanks to Chesko for his great mods
Thanks to Brumbek for SMIM (permission granted)
Thanks to Telamont for his Wearable Lanterns SMIM Patch meshes & textures (Authorize by mod permission)
Thanks to Uncheat for his Glass fix for Cheskos Wearable Lanterns texture and method to fix reflection. (No answer to my request and hasn't provided any additional distribution permission)
Thanks to IceKK and Jacques00art for Equipement HDT
Thanks to Nifskope Author for this great tool.

[color=#ff7700][size=4][u]My releases[/u][/size][/color]
